title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. G, ch. II, pt. 271 - Grant Of Easement In Lands Underwater For Cables, Conduits, Pipelines, Hydroelectric Power
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. G, ch. II, pt. 271 - Grant Of Easement In Lands Underwater For Cables, Conduits, Pipelines, Hydroelectric Power

State Regulations
§ 271.1 - Repealed
§ 271.2 to 271.5 - Repealed
§ 271.6 to 271.7 - Repealed

Subpart 271-1 - Application Procedures; Fees (§ 271-1.1 to 271-1.7)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. G, ch. II, pt. 271

Statutory authority: Public Lands Law, §§10, 75

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
